resources.string: CREATE TABLE user(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, username ntext, password ntext, security_token ntext)

CREATE TABLE appointment(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, datetime DATETIME, client_name ntext, client_address ntext, client_zipcode ntext, client_city ntext, client_phonenumber ntext, time_start TIME, time_finish TIME, comment ntext)
CREATE TABLE task(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, appointment_id INTEGER NOT NULL, description ntext, complete BOOL NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(appointment_id) REFERENCES appointment(id) )
